name: Pixie cup, large
description:
This 16 ounce slip cast ceramic cup is light, durable, and stylish! It is microwavable and dishwasher safe. The decal image is drawn by Harrison, and Joan makes the cup. It makes a great gift, and is great to use at home or on the go. Now with new color decals!

This cup is approximately 6x4 inches.

name: Sugar box girl print
description: This 3 color screenprint is 7x9 inches big and was printed by Harrison Bucy our studio in Providence.  It is on florescent pink archival paper and is an edition of 30.

name: 100% Human Hair
description: This 4 color screen print is 8x11 inches big and was printed by Harrison Bucy our studio in Providence. It is on florescent pink archival paper and is an edition of 20.

name: Fabulous Batman
description: This amazing print is 3 colors and measures 11x14'' inches on florescent pink archival paper. Also this print is super limited addition of only 5 for sale! SO get them quick!

name: Snot queen print
description:
Harrison draws everyday, mainly people and monsters from comics, movies, old yearbooks, and the internet.  His prints are complex compositions inspired by images from his sketchbooks with hints of halftone pulled from old advertisements.  The colors and variety of figures create an unlived nostalgia that allows the viewer to imagine a history undefined by a timeline.  

This 4 color screenprint is 18x24, and was created in 2012.

name: Heart comb necklace
description: This ceramic necklace is cast from flotsam I've collected along the Narraganset Bay. The hand crafted bead is unique and strung on an adjustable gray leather cord.

name: Red golf stone necklace
description: This ceramic necklace is cast from flotsam I've collected along the Narraganset Bay. The hand crafted bead is unique and strung on an adjustable black leather cord.

name: Blue geode necklace
description: This ceramic necklace is cast from flotsam I've collected along the Narraganset Bay.  The hand crafted bead is unique and strung on an adjustable black leather cord.

name: Bolt necklace
description: This ceramic necklace is cast from flotsam I've collected along the Narraganset Bay. The hand crafted bead is unique and strung on an adjustable black leather cord.

name: Mini geode sphere
description:
Joan is very aware of our material culture, and likes to transform the refuse she collects into beautiful objects.  These geode spheres appear as crystal rock formations, but are fabricated in ceramic from cast flotsam and glazed with recycled glass shards.  These objects tastefully comment on the longevity of disposable products and highlight the reusability of ceramics.

Mini geode spheres are made from ceramic and glass, and hang easily on the wall with one nail. Each geode is unique and approximately 3 ½” x 2 ½”.

The geode you receive will slightly vary from the ones in the image.
Geodes come in white, black, silver, blue, aqua, green, pink, red, yellow, or brown.  If you prefer a specific color please specify when you place your order!

name: Geode cube
description:
Joan is very aware of our material culture, and likes to transform the refuse she collects into beautiful objects.  These geode cubes appear as crystal rock formations, but are fabricated in ceramic from cast flotsam and glazed with recycled glass shards.  These objects tastefully comment on the longevity of disposable products and highlight the reusability of ceramics.

Mini geode cubes are made from ceramic and glass, and hang easily on the wall with two nails. Each geode is unique and approximately 2 ½ x 2 ½x 2 ½ ”.

The geode you receive will slightly vary from the ones in the image.
Geodes come in white, black, silver, blue, aqua, green, pink, red, yellow, or brown.
